document.full_text: factories in europe eased off the accelerator last month but chinese and indian manufacturers bumped up production, so far unscathed by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami, surveys showed on friday.
document.title: world factories buoyant as price pressures rising
lines_and_colors: factories in europe eased off the accelerator last month but chinese and indian manufacturers bumped up production, so far unscathed by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami, surveys showed on friday.
